stories.text:
So I am a 24 YO experienced digital marketer based in Sydney, Australia. I am looking to join an early stage startup in a marketing role as I have always been interested in owning and scaling technology products. Best bet would be joining a startup I guess as I don't have a strong network in the industry.

I have 4 years experience owning and scaling non-tech products in non-tech industry. Also, led marketing teams. Now I am having difficulties finding a job in a startup.

I'd love to get some suggestions and ideas on how I might be able to get in. Love to hear some of marketer's experience here.

Also, I am thinking of simulating a marketing plan for my top selected startups. Would that be worth the time and energy?

Thanks in advance for all the answers

I have applied to a bunch of them but
stories.title: Marketers Who Work at a Startup. How Did You Get In?
